add_library(imgui_glfw_opengl3 STATIC)

target_sources(
    imgui_glfw_opengl3
    PRIVATE
 
    imgui.cpp
    imgui.h
    imgui_draw.cpp
    imgui_internal.h
    imgui_widgets.cpp
    imstb_rectpack.h
    imstb_textedit.h
    imstb_truetype.h

    imgui_impl_glfw.cpp
    imgui_impl_glfw.h
    imgui_impl_opengl3.h
    imgui_impl_opengl3.cpp
)

    PUBLIC
    imgui_glfw_opengl3
)

target_link_libraries(imgui_glfw_opengl3 PRIVATE glfw glew_s ${OPENGL_LIBRARY})
